trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is displayed on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項是否顯示在 Web 網頁上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is displayed on a Web page; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項可以顯示在 Web 網頁上，則為 <see langword="false" />，否則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is hidden remains in its zone, is actually rendered on its page, and participates in page life cycle phases such as the `PreRender` phase, even though it is not visible in a browser.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項是隱藏的仍會留在其區域中，實際上會轉譯在其頁面上，並參與頁面生命週期階段例如`PreRender`階段，即使在瀏覽器中看不到。

trans-unit.source: This is different from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are closed, because closed controls are not even rendered on a page, while hidden controls are rendered and active in Web Parts applications, though not visible to users.
trans-unit.target: 這點不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>已關閉，因為已關閉的控制項根本沒有呈現在頁面上，但使用者看不到，雖然隱藏的控制項轉譯和 Web 組件的應用程式中作用中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set hides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by setting its cascading style sheet (CSS) style to a value of `display:none`.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合會隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>藉由設定其階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式的值控制`display:none`。

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property for a control is set to `true`, the control is still displayed if the current display mode on the page allows hidden controls to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>控制項的屬性設定為`true`，如果目前的顯示模式，在頁面可讓要顯示隱藏的控制項，仍會顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, edit mode allows hidden controls to be displayed, so that users can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 例如，編輯模式可讓要顯示隱藏的控制項，以便使用者可以編輯它們。

trans-unit.source: When hidden controls are visible in certain display modes, the title of the control displays a string indicating that the control is in hidden status.
trans-unit.target: 在某些顯示模式顯示隱藏的控制項時，控制項的標題會顯示，指出控制項處於隱藏狀態的字串。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is set to `false`, which is the default, the control is displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制設為 `false`、 預設值、 在頁面上顯示的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> property is set to `false`, end users are not allowed to edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不允許使用者編輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that in the Web page, in the declarative markup for the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element, the `Hidden` attribute value is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在網頁中的宣告式標記`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`項目，`Hidden`屬性值設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The `TextDisplayWebPart` control will not appear if the page is loaded in a browser.
trans-unit.target: `TextDisplayWebPart`控制項不會出現在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。

trans-unit.source: However, the control is still present on the page and in its zone, and it still could participate in connections with other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls if you created those connections.
trans-unit.target: 不過，此控制項是仍會出現在頁面上，在其區域中，而且仍然無法參與連線與其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，如果您建立這些連線。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an error message that is used if errors occur when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is imported.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，如果匯入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項時發生錯誤，就可以使用此錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message.
trans-unit.target: 包含錯誤訊息的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a standard error message supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 Web 組件控制集所提供的標準錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> property allows you to set a custom error message that is displayed if an error occurs when a user tries to import a part control's description file into a catalog of Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A>屬性可讓您設定當使用者嘗試將組件控制項的說明檔案匯入 Web 組件控制項的類別目錄時，發生錯誤時顯示的自訂錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property declaratively on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, adding the `ImportErrorMessage` attribute within the opening tag of the control and assigning an error message string to it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定屬性，以宣告方式在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，請加入`ImportErrorMessage`控制項和錯誤訊息字串指派給它的開頭標記內的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For a full code example that demonstrates both exporting and importing .WebPart description files for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, which includes use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼範例，示範如何匯出及匯入。Web 組件描述檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，其中包括使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is currently closed on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項目前是否已在 Web 組件頁面上關閉。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control is closed.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出控制項是否為已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is closed is not rendered on the page and does not participate in page events.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>已關閉的控制項不會轉譯頁面上，不會參與網頁事件。

trans-unit.source: However, it is maintained in a page catalog by the Web Parts application, and can be added back to the page by users if the appropriate user interface (UI) is provided.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它由 Web 組件應用程式頁面類別目錄中維護，而且可以加入至網頁的使用者提供適當的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is shared, meaning that it is visible to all users of a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項是否共用，也就是，是否 Web 組件頁面的所有使用者都可以看見。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control has shared user visibility on a Web page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項在 Web 網頁上具有共用使用者可視性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 共用的 Web 組件控制項使用者都可以看到所有的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to a page.
trans-unit.target: 共用控制的相反是每個使用者控制項，這是特定使用者只能看見該控制項加入至頁面的使用者。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者共用的個人化範圍中檢視網頁時，會加入一個動態控制項，控制項將會共用。

trans-unit.source: If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value for that control will be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已加入但使用者卻使用者個人化範圍，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>該控制項的屬性值將是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用和每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: When you load the Web page in a browser and click the **Check Sharing** button, the code checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and the value of the property is `true`, because the control is referenced as a static control in the declarative markup of the page.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**檢查共用**按鈕，這個程式碼會檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>屬性`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項和屬性的值是`true`，因為參考的控制項為靜態控制項中頁面的宣告式的標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is standalone, meaning that it is not contained within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項是否為獨立的，也就是說，它不包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域之中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is not contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項不包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is a static control, which means the control is declared in the markup of a Web Parts page and not added to the page programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項是否為靜態控制項，也就是說，控制項是在 Web 組件頁面的標記中宣告，而不是透過程式設計加入至網頁。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control is static.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出控制項是否為靜態。

trans-unit.source: A static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項是在 Web 組件頁面標記中宣告的。

trans-unit.source: This contrasts with a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, which is added either programmatically or by a user selecting the control from a catalog of controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這與動態相反<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，這以程式設計方式加入 或由使用者控制從選取類別目錄的控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Enables derived classes to provide custom handling when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is closed on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項在 Web 組件頁面上關閉時，可以讓衍生的類別提供自訂處理。

trans-unit.source: The method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class contains no implementation.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別包含任何實作。

trans-unit.source: Derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can override the method if needed to provide custom handling when the control is closed.
trans-unit.target: 衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可以覆寫方法，如果提供的自訂處理控制項關閉時所需。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control automatically invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing%2A> method if you provide an implementation in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>自動叫用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing%2A>方法，如果您提供衍生類別中的實作。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Enables derived classes to provide custom handling when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is beginning or ending the process of connecting to other controls.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項開始或結束連接至其他控制項的處理序時，可以讓衍生的類別提供自訂處理。

trans-unit.source: The method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class contains no implementation.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別包含任何實作。

trans-unit.source: A derived control needs to override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的控制項需要覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Developers can raise custom events or carry out other actions.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以引發自訂事件或執行其他動作。

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting" /> methods are called to establish connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: 方法會呼叫<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />負責控制何時<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" />和<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting" />方法會呼叫控制項間建立連接。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Enables derived classes to provide custom handling when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is permanently removed from a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項從 Web 組件頁面永遠移除時，可以讓衍生的類別提供自訂處理。

trans-unit.source: The method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class contains no implementation.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別包含任何實作。

trans-unit.source: A derived control needs to override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的控制項需要覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Developers can raise custom events or carry out other actions.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以引發自訂事件或執行其他動作。

trans-unit.source: The method is called when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法時，會呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" />方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Enables derived classes to provide custom handling when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is entering or leaving edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項進入或離開編輯模式時，可以讓衍生的類別提供自訂處理。

trans-unit.source: The method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class contains no implementation.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別包含任何實作。

trans-unit.source: A derived control needs to override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method, and use the overridden method to raise a custom event.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的控制項需要覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，並使用覆寫的方法，以引發自訂事件。

trans-unit.source: Developers can raise custom events or carry out other actions.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以引發自訂事件或執行其他動作。

trans-unit.source: The method is called when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing" /> methods are called during editing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法時，會呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart)" />和<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing" />編輯期間呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag indicating that personalization data has changed for a Web Parts control or a server control placed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 設定旗標，指出已變更置於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域之 Web 組件控制項或伺服器控制項的個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag indicating that personalization data has changed for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control instance.
trans-unit.target: 設定旗標，指出已變更目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項執行個體的個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A> method sets a flag indicating that control state data has been changed (personalized) on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control therefore needs to persist the personalization data to long term storage.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A>方法會設定旗標，表示，已變更控制項狀態資料 （個人） 上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，而且<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項因此需要保存的長期儲存到個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: Normally the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> persists personalization changes on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls without a need for developers to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>個人化變更保存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，而不需要開發人員呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: But there are two cases in which developers do need to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 但有兩種情況下，開發人員需要呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The first case is when control state data is changed during an HTTP `GET` request to a page.
trans-unit.target: 第一個案例中是 HTTP 時變更控制項狀態資料時`GET`網頁要求。

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to control state data during a `GET` request are not persisted (for security purposes).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，控制項狀態資料變更期間`GET`要求不會保存 （基於安全性目的）。

trans-unit.source: But the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A> method provides a way to persist legitimate personalization changes to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in this case.
trans-unit.target: 但是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A>方法可用來保存合法的個人化變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制在此情況下。

trans-unit.source: The second case for calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A> method occurs during an HTTP `POST` request to a page.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的第二個情況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A>方法時發生 HTTP`POST`網頁要求。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has complex personalizable properties (such as a property that contains an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object), and control state data in those properties is personalized during a `POST` request, developers must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A> method to ensure that the changes are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項具有複雜可個人化的屬性 (例如屬性，其中包含<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>物件)，以及在這些屬性的控制項狀態資料個人化期間`POST`要求時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A>若要確保所做的變更會保存的方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> for which the personalization data has changed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />，其個人化資料已經變更。

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag indicating that personalization data has changed for the specified server control that resides in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 設定旗標，指出已變更位於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域之指定伺服器控制項的個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method has the same purpose as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which is to set a flag indicating that control state data has been changed (personalized) on a server control during an HTTP `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法具有相同目的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，也就是設定旗標，表示控制項狀態資料已變更 （個人） 伺服器控制項期間 HTTP`GET`要求。

trans-unit.source: The difference between these methods is that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is used for server controls that do not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, but are placed within <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones to participate in Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法之間的差異在於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法用於伺服器控制項，不會繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別，但位於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>參與 Web 組件的應用程式的區域。

trans-unit.source: The object in the <paramref name="control" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 參數中的物件為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The control derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Controls that derive from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> should use the protected <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 的控制項應該改用受保護的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.SetPersonalizationDirty" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The page associated with the control does not have a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項相關聯的網頁沒有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that is concatenated with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title" /> property value to form a complete title for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title" /> 屬性值串連的字串，組成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的完整標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，做為控制項的副標題。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> property optionally to return a standard subtitle string in your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that will be appended to the control's title.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性選擇性地在您的自訂傳回標準副標題字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，將會附加至控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: If you provide a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> property in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> property to create a complete title for the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A>中自訂屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，Web 組件控制項集合會自動將它附加到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>屬性，以建立完整的標題控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to provide a subtitle for instances of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何提供的子標題的自訂執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中的第一個部分包含名為自訂控制項的程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: This control is the same as the custom control which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview, except that it also overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> property to provide a standard subtitle containing a fictitious company name for instances of the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項是自訂控制項的範例 > 一節中找到相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀，不同之處在於它也會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性以提供標準副標題包含虛構的公司名稱的執行個體自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件與`Register`在網頁指示詞。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的第二部分會示範如何建立參考的網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, the control's title bar text includes the title assigned to the control in the declarative markup, a hyphen separator, and the value of the custom subtitle from the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，控制項的標題列文字包含指派給宣告式標記、 連字號分隔字元和值的自訂子標題，從控制項的標題`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: To supply a subtitle for instances of a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control, you must override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供的子標題的自訂執行個體<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項，必須覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of a part control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定組件控制項標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the title of the part control.
trans-unit.target: 表示組件控制項標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If a developer assigns a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> property, then that value determines all (or at least part of) the text in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 如果開發人員指派將值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>屬性，則該值會判斷所有 （或至少一部分） 控制項的標題列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The title text also appears as part of the ToolTip text when you position your mouse pointer over the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or other server control that appears in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: 標題文字也會顯示為工具提示文字的一部分時，您將滑鼠指標置於的標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項或出現在其他伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>區域。

trans-unit.source: The complete text displayed in a control's title bar is also affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的標題列中顯示的完整文字也受到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If that property has a value assigned to it, the value is concatenated to the title.
trans-unit.target: 如果該屬性指派給它的值，此值就會串連至標題。

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> property, a calculated title is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定任何值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>屬性的導出的標題會顯示。

trans-unit.source: At any point, developers can retrieve the actual, total text displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control's title bar by getting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以在任何時間點，擷取中顯示的實際、 總數文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>所取得的值的控制項的標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style of the title text is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> property of the zone that contains the part control.
trans-unit.target: 標題文字的樣式由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>屬性包含組件控制項的區域。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates the use of the base property, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何使用基底屬性的程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a Web Parts control in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定至影像的 URL，該影像用於表示控制項標題列中的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in its title bar.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示至影像的 URL，該影像用於表示其標題列中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the control appears with an image in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項，，以便在控制項出現在控制項的目錄中的映像。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: In the declarative markup of the Web page, note the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element.
trans-unit.target: 在網頁上的宣告式標記，請注意`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Its `TitleIconImageUrl` attribute is assigned a string that contains the URL to an image file.
trans-unit.target: 其`TitleIconImageUrl`屬性被指派包含映像檔案的 URL 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser, and if you provided a legitimate URL to an image, the image appears in the title bar of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 中載入網頁瀏覽器中，而且如果您提供的映像的合法 URL，映像會出現在標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The internal validation system has determined that the URL might contain script attacks.
trans-unit.target: 內部驗證系統判斷此 URL 可能包含指令碼攻擊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之補充資訊的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a URL to more information about the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之詳細資訊的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a URL to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property, the title of the control becomes a link to supplemental information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性、 控制項的標題會變成控制項的補充資訊的連結。

trans-unit.source: The URL is not rendered when the page is in a display mode where controls can be dragged, such as design, edit, or catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 當頁面顯示模式，其中可以拖曳控制項，例如設計、 編輯或類別目錄的模式，就不會轉譯 URL。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element contains the `TitleUrl` attribute with a fictitious URL.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素包含`TitleUrl`虛構的 url 屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you load the page in a browser, the title of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is now a link to the resource pointed to by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將頁面載入瀏覽器中的標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項現在是指向資源的連結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The internal validation system has determined that the URL might contain script attacks.
trans-unit.target: 內部驗證系統判斷此 URL 可能包含指令碼攻擊。

trans-unit.source: Causes the control to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 讓控制項追蹤其檢視狀態的變更，以便將這些變更儲存在物件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項相關聯之自訂動詞命令的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> that contains custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> objects associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" />，包含與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 控制項相關聯的自訂 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Verbs derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令是衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別，並提供使用者介面 (UI) 動作，使用者可以在上執行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Usually verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items.
trans-unit.target: 通常動詞命令會在 UI 中以按鈕、 連結或功能表項目表示。

trans-unit.source: By default, common Web Parts verbs appear on a drop-down verbs menu in each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 預設情況下，通用 Web 組件動詞命令，會出現在下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項的標題列。

trans-unit.source: There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file.
trans-unit.target: 沒有開啟、 關閉、 編輯和最小化控制項，以及用於匯出的定義控制項或載入的說明檔的其他指令動詞的標準動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: These verbs are not included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs that you create and return by overriding this property in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 中不包含這些動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>集合，因為集合包含只有自訂的動詞命令，您建立並傳回所覆寫衍生類別中的這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you create custom verbs and add them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立自訂動詞命令，並將其新增至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>集合，然後您可以存取的動詞命令，以程式設計方式從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property for a custom Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，工作的程式碼範例，您必須新增設定，若要啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔案的 Web.config 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example.
trans-unit.target: 確定您具有網頁上的相同目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Within the `<system.web>` section, make sure there is a `<webParts>` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup.
trans-unit.target: 內`<system.web>`區段中，請確定沒有`<webParts>`具有項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，在下列標記中。

trans-unit.source: Load the Web page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入網頁瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: When you click the **Display Verb Count** button, it accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property to get the count of custom verbs for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and displays the count in a label.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下**顯示動詞計數** 按鈕，存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>屬性，即可取得的自訂動詞命令計數`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後在標籤中顯示計數。

trans-unit.source: Because no custom verbs have been added to the control in this case, the count is zero.
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有自訂動詞命令已加入至控制項在此情況下，計數為零。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs" /> property to allow users to add custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> objects to the verb collection for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs" />屬性，以允許使用者新增自訂<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />至的動詞集合的物件<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to enable it to be edited by custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的參考，以便讓自訂 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控制項編輯該控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that consists of the child control of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的子控制項組成。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and also create related custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to enable users to edit the control at run time, you must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface, which includes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，然後也建立相關的自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項，可讓使用者編輯控制項的執行時間，您必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>介面，其中包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control enters edit mode, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property is called by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control to get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and enable the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to edit it.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項進入編輯模式，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A>屬性由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>取得參考的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，以及啟用自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>對其進行編輯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項執行個體相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />，與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts page always has a single instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件頁面一律擁有的單一執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks and manages all the other Web Parts controls on a page, including all zones that derive from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, and all part controls that derive from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制追蹤和管理所有其他 Web 組件頁面上的控制項，包括衍生自基底的所有區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別和衍生自基底的所有組件控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A> property exists so that every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be associated with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>屬性存在，讓每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>與相關聯控制項及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, in turn, maintains a collection of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，接著，會維護所有的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在頁面上的控制項及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Web 伺服器控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> that represents the width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> 代表控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone that currently contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域，該區域目前包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> that currently contains a Web Parts control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" />，目前在 Web 網頁上包含一個 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts control is currently closed on a page, the return value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 組件控制項目前已在網頁上關閉，則傳回的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: In the architecture of the Web Parts control set, controls can have Web Parts functionality only if they operate inside of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 組件控制項集合的架構中，控制項才可以有 Web 組件功能它們作業內的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: The standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone to use on Web pages is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 標準<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>網頁上使用的區域是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Although end users can move Web Parts controls between different zones on a Web page, a given instance of a control can reside in only one zone at a time.
trans-unit.target: 雖然使用者可以在網頁上的不同區域之間移動 Web 組件控制項，控制項的指定執行個體可位於只有一個區域中，一次。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts control, and its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property to keep track of which zone the control currently resides in, and what common layout and style characteristics of the zone apply to all contained Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項，以及其相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>來追蹤目前的區域控制項的屬性所在，以及一般區域的版面配置和樣式特性套用到包含的所有 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> properties for a custom Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: There are two `<asp:webpartzone>` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個`<asp:webpartzone>`元素在頁面上，每個都代表 Web 組件區域。

trans-unit.source: The first zone contains a standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, which acts like a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control at run time because it is in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 第一個區域包含標準<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項的作用就像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制在執行階段，因為它是在區域中。

trans-unit.source: The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 第二個區域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> property for the control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the zone that currently contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下**區域資訊** 按鈕，`Label1`控制項顯示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>控制項屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>區域目前包含控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index position of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項在其區域中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: 控制項在其區域中的數值順序。

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: 區域中第一個控制項的索引值為零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates a Web Parts control's numerical order (or ordinal position) within its zone, relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>屬性表示 Web 組件控制項的數字的順序 （或序數位置） 在其區域中，區域中其他控制項的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項使用這個屬性來追蹤和管理它的 Web 網頁上的 Web 組件控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: You cannot assume that the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control will equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection of the control's zone.
trans-unit.target: 您不能假設的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>控制項的屬性將會等於相同的控制項內的索引值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>控制項的內部網路區域的集合。

trans-unit.source: Often a control's relative position in its zone (its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> value), and its index within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection of its zone, will be different values as controls are added to and removed from zones.
trans-unit.target: 通常控制項的相對位置的區域中 (其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>值)，和它的索引內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>其區域中，集合將會是不同的值，加入及移除區域的控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> properties for a custom Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: There are two `<asp:webpartzone>` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個`<asp:webpartzone>`元素在頁面上，每個都代表 Web 組件區域。

trans-unit.source: The first zone contains a standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, which acts like a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control at run time because it is in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 第一個區域包含標準<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項的作用就像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制在執行階段，因為它是在區域中。

trans-unit.source: The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 第二個區域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> property for the control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the zone that currently contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下**區域資訊** 按鈕，`Label1`控制項顯示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>控制項屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>區域目前包含控制項的屬性。
